message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.apache.metron.rest.model.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'org.mockito.MockitoAnnotations'.
Import statement for 'org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Import statement for 'org.mockito.Mockito.*' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.mockito.Mockito.*.
